6.00-8:00P,M, Dinner Meeting* -- 2nd floor Lounge -- 345 East 46th Street
Guest of honor and speaker--Dr. George D. Stoddard, Dean,
School of Education, New York University, and member. Board
of Directors of the Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, Inc.
Dr. Stoddard will discuss the relation of the Lincoln Center to
the mass media. Dr, Stoddard will be introduced by Dr. Kenneth
Bartlett, Vice President of Syracuse University,
*The meeting will end promptly, so that theatre-goers can make
their curtains.

Theme: The Potential for Improved Communications between
